import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation_df = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Prepare features and target
X_train = train_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['SalePrice']

X_test = test_df.drop(['Id'], axis=1)
X_val = validation_df.drop(['Id', 'SalePrice'], axis=1)
y_val = validation_df['SalePrice']

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Handle missing values
for col in categorical_columns:
    X_train[col] = X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].mode()[0])
    X_test[col] = X_test[col].fillna(X_test[col].mode()[0])
    X_val[col] = X_val[col].fillna(X_val[col].mode()[0])

for col in numerical_columns:
    X_train[col] = X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].median())
    X_test[col] = X_test[col].fillna(X_test[col].median())
    X_val[col] = X_val[col].fillna(X_val[col].median())

# One-hot encode categorical variables
preprocessor = ColumnTransformer(
    transformers=[
        ('cat', OneHotEncoder(drop='first', handle_unknown='ignore'), categorical_columns),
        ('num', 'passthrough', numerical_columns)
    ]
)

# Create pipeline
model = Pipeline([
    ('preprocessor', preprocessor),
    ('regressor', RandomForestRegressor(n_estimators=100, random_state=42))
])

# Train model
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict on validation set
y_val_pred = model.predict(X_val)

# Evaluate on validation set
val_r2 = r2_score(y_va

y_train = train_df['SalePrice']

        X_test[col] = X_test[col].fillna('None')

        mode_val = X_train[col].mode()

            X_test[col] = X_test[col].fillna('Unknown')

            X_train[col] = X_train[col].fillna(mode_val[0])
            X_test[col] = X_test[col].fillna(mode_val[0])

for col in numerical_columns:
    X_train[col] = X_train[col].fillna(X_train[col].median())

    ]
)

# Create pipeline
